Hello guys please if you have issues transferring money through the wema bank app. Its because you paste the account number first before selecting the bank. Once you paste the account number and click the bank next you'll be getting retry error when trying to load account details. So to get a successful transfer (1) select the name of the recipient bank first and then after selecting the bank (2) you paste the account number of the recipient it'll load the name of the account owner successfully
